name: Timothy for Change
description: Examining the historical, economic, and political forces behind humanitarian crises across the Global Southâ€”from Palestine to the Sahel. This includes the legacies of colonialism, imperialism, and the rise of global capitalism and neoliberalism, as well as their persistence in neo-colonial and neo-imperialist forms. My goal is to equip people with the knowledge to advocate effectively, provide informed support, and take meaningful action addressing both immediate needs and systemic injustice.

links.title: GiveDirectly
links.description: A non-profit that sends cash directly to people living in extreme poverty, empowering them to make choices that improve their lives on their own terms.

links.title: ShareTheMeal
links.description: A simple, tech-driven way to provide meals to children and families in crisis, connecting everyday actions to global hunger relief.

links.title: WaterAid
links.description: An international non-profit working to ensure clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene are accessible to all, tackling inequalities in health and infrastructure.
